column1: Neuroticism: Tendencies to feel anxious, touchy, socially insecure, sad and indecisive
Disagreeableness: Tendencies to feel better than others, to want to compete and dominate, and to be judgemental
Extraversion: Tendencies to like other people and their company, and to feel energetic
Conscientiousness: Tendencies to be organised, diligent, reliable, punctual, and perfectionist
Openness: Tendencies to be curious, creative, imaginative, and to like intellectual pursuits
